DOC.detailed_description: The study 's main objective investigate extract contain probiotic Bifidobacterium animalis subsp . lactis BPL1 ( CECT 8145 ) positive effect accumulation abdominal visceral fat people abdominal obesity . Participants : 129 men woman waist circumference ≥102 cm ( men ) ≥88 cm ( woman ) , randomly assign one 3 treatment group parallel : one group ( 43 member ) active probiotic , another one probiotic inactivate heat , last group placebo . Treatment consist product consumption study 12 week , take 1 capsule per day . 4 visit study , pre-inclusion visit 3 study visit ( week 1 , 6 , 12 ) schedule . Secondary objective asses probiotic 's effect : - accumulation subcutaneous body fat body weight , body mass index ( BMI ) waist circumference . - glucose metabolism insulin resistance . - blood lipid profile . - blood pressure . - inflammation . - circulating level adiponectin leptin . - change intestinal microbiome The statistical analysis follow principle specify guideline ICHE9 CPMP/EWP/908/99 ICHE9 Points Consider Multiplicity Issues Clinical Trials .
